post.body: That sucks and is also freaking scary.
You deserve it, man. Hope they were pretty tasty.
Holler at me when you get in.
LOL @ the AFC West.
I hope Taco Johns is open.
is it that bad up there? Cuz its headed here.
I'm having one for you, bro.
This just in: the planet Earth is in the tank for PEBO.
Is all about the lulz.
When Bruce Willis died, at the end of "Sixth Sense", I.....
Rod Blagojevich is probably the biggest moron on the planet today. Really, Rod? REALLY!?!
Is playing Dead Space.
MacGruber!!
Is watching Dean v. Cora on Iron Chef.
Is playing 'Ico', a rare classic PS2 game. Thanks, JW.
Needs to get off my ass and work.
Is basking in the aftermath of a border war victory.
Just saw Role Models as part of a work function.
is in the middle of ANOTHER report.
Everything is fine.
Has to go to the ER. Kid's not doing well.
The Chiefs. Nuff said.
Finally beat Gears of War 2.
Is pretty much going to be waiting for the rest of his life.
Is gettin' down at Smokehouse BBQ.
Took about 10 seconds for the flavor to leave this super bubble.
Is dining at the United Way "Victory 2008" lunch. So far so good (food wise).
Got a haircut, playing Dead Space, I mean working. But our thoughts are with our friend JW, who is facing the worst day of his life.
1 hour of office time on Friday. I'm pooped. Let's have some BBQ!
I am actually AT the office today.
Apparently likes to refer to himself in the third person. Not sure why I do that.
Is stuck like Chuck.
Is pouring one out for two of his homies now. What a crap week.
I earned 800 Best Buy reward zone points today without spending a dime. Silver premier, here I come! Didn't get to keep those purchases tho.
I mean BradforD.
The Chiefs. I'm really not mad about the loss because Seattle & Cincy won today so that puts us drafting third. Sam Bradfors, come on down!
Note to Coatmakers: its ok to make sleeves longer.
Going back to Fallout 3
Its 3am; I just beat Dead Space. Good game, not great. Well, great for EA. Ending was kinda meh. I'd play a sequel & bet EA will make one.
I am facing Chapter 11.............on 'Dead Space'.
Celebrated my brothers Masters tonight with family at the Eldridge. A great night had by all. BIG fan of the fruit and cheese plate!
It took me 25 minutes to get to the office. I can't leave now.
I just scored the entire series of "The Wire" for $90. Thank you, Best Buy.
I'm peacing out early today. Looking to beat the weather.
I'm now at a crossroads: should I save Megaton, or nuke it?
I'm at a crossroads, here. Should I save the citizens of Megaton, or nuke them?
I'm at a crossroads, here. Should I save the citizens of Megaton, or nuke them?
D'ANGELO!!!!
Epic fail in the FF Championship. Not starting LJ, Gerrard, Titans D, may have cost me big. I need D'Angelo Williams to come up HUGE.
F U Matt Leinart. You just cost me $150.
Now Tyler Thigpen is costing me money.
Tony Romo is costing me money.
I'm at Cracker Barrel for some God forsaken reason and they have Wolf Shirts!!1ohe
Wow. I totally b*tched out and fell asleep early.
F3 is kicking my A.
Its taken me about 6 hours but I'm starting to get Fallout 3.
